title: bhaaramellam vaithEn
sahitya:
bhAramellAm vaittEn un pAdattil bhAramellAm vaittEn



anupallavi



AruyirkkuyirAgum appA nI akhilattai aNuvenat-tAngiDum

Atralaip-pArttu nAn



caraNam 1



nilaiyinri eppOdum alai manam shErvinai malai malaiyAyennuL

maNDikkiDakkudE



caraNam 2



iruvinai muTTaiyai ini shumakka mATTEn karuvinai tavirkka un

karuNaiyai viDa mATTEn



caraNam 3



sandaiyum kalaindu sharakkellAm viTradu vanda varaiyum

tanduviTTEn ayyA 



caraNam 4



kUppiDum tuNaikkingE kUDa varuvRillai shAppiTTa cattiram

kAppATrum vIDAmO 



caraNam 5



pOkku varavu sheyyum poi man shumaiyinait-tUkka valiyillai

tonrAt-tuNaiyE
